title: Person Medium Skin Tone Beard
description: A person with a medium skin tone and a beard. This emoji can represent a person, a father figure, or someone who embodies ruggedness, wisdom, or a distinguished appearance.
apple_vendor_description: This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, presents a distinguished individual with a well-defined beard, rendered with Appleâ€™s characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges. The medium skin tone is subtly highlighted, giving the figure a realistic and approachable appearance.  The presence of the beard adds a touch of maturity and character, making this emoji a versatile option for representing oneself or others in a thoughtful and grounded manner.
